description: Solve PTA problems in VS Code
configuration.pintia.workspaceFolder: The path of the workspace folder to store the problem files.
configuration.pintia.paging.pageSize: Whether to page the problem list when the problem set is too large. It is not paged when pageSize is 0.
configuration.pintia.enableStatusBar: Specify whether the Pintia status bar is displayed.
configuration.pintia.autoCheckIn: Specify whether to automatically check in Pintia's education supermarket when the Pintia Extension is activated.
configuration.pintia.defaultLanguage: Default language for solving the problems.
configuration.pintia.editor.shortcuts.te: Test your answer with customized test cases.
configuration.pintia.editor.shortcuts.pr: Preview the problem in the webview.
configuration.pintia.searchIndex.ignoreZ: Specify whether to ignore the problem set ***ZOJ Problem Set*** in problem search index.
configuration.pintia.searchIndex.autoRef: Specify whether to automatically refresh problem search index when the Pintia Extension is activated. It is not recommended to set it due to the low-frequency update and time-consuming.
configuration.pintia.autoCreateProblemSe: Specify whether to automatically create a problem set folder and place source code files in this directory when coding a problem.
walkthroughs.title: Get Started with Pintia (PTA)
walkthroughs.description: Practice the problems in Pintia (PTA) in VS Code!
walkthroughs.overview.title: Overview
walkthroughs.overview.description:
PTA Extension in VS Code
[Open in GitHub](command:pintia.openExtensionRepo)
walkthroughs.signIn.title: Sign In
walkthroughs.signIn.description:
Use WeChat to scan QR codes to sign in the Pintia(PTA).
[Sign In](command:pintia.signIn)
walkthroughs.previewProblem.title: Preview/Code Problem
walkthroughs.previewProblem.description: After logging in to your account, click on a problem title in the list to preview its content.
walkthroughs.submitTestSolution.title: Submit/Test Solution
walkthroughs.submitTestSolution.descript: Click the shortcut ``Submit/Test`` in the editor to submit/test your solution to PTA.
walkthroughs.searchProblem.title: Search Problem
walkthroughs.searchProblem.description:
You can search for problems in the following two ways:
1. Open the [Command Palette](command:workbench.action.showCommands) and run the command 
``Pintia: Search Problem``.
[Pintia Search Problem](command:pintia.searchProblem)
2. Click the ``Search`` icon at the top of PTA view.
walkthroughs.testCustomSolution.title: Test Custom Samples
walkthroughs.testCustomSolution.descript:
Type ``ptatest`` to quickly add custom test samples
Click ``Test custom sample N`` to test your samples.
walkthroughs.addTemplates.title: Add Code Templates
walkthroughs.addTemplates.description: Type the prefix of ``pta`` to add common code templates
walkthroughs.commandPalette.title: Use Shortcut Commands
walkthroughs.commandPalette.description:
Open the [Command Palette](command:workbench.action.showCommands) and run shortcut commands.
1. ``Cmd+Shift+P`` (in Mac)
2. ``Ctrl+Shift+P`` (in Windows/Linux)
